metadata.name: Kintsugi
metadata.description:
Oh, she was broken, scarred by blades of betrayal
She was lost, not knowing who she was anymore
Her insecurities had drowned her daily.
She was scared to look in the mirror.
She was scared of what she'll find there in.
Until love found her, she dances around in darkness.
Love healed her, it sealed her wounds, strengthened her heart
She never would be who she was 
But she loves the new version of her ; Scarred, yet whole
Her flaws made her stronger.
